Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Sonic.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Tails.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Knuckles.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Amy.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Choose a variety of different sounds for the Spin Dash.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: Choose which types of BGM you want to play in Cyber Space.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir6
Description: Toggle a language of your liking to play during Guardian Intros or to turn them off, making Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir7
Description: Determine if you wish to keep ''Mystery Girl'' or replace it with each Titan's instrumental theme when encountering them for the first time.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir8
Description: Toggle a language of your liking to play during Super Sonic's Titan Sequences or to turn them off, making Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir9
Description: Choose the boss theme for The End.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir10
Description: Determine which version of Ouranos Island you wish to play when in Another Story.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir11
Description: Choose which types of BGM you want to play in Another Story's Cyber Space stages.
Improving the vanilla sounds by restoring sound details inspired by previous titles and replacing existing sounds with higher quality versions.
Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - New Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Old Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

Adds the Drop Dash charging sound, making it faithful to Frontiers.
Keeps the Spin Dash sounds unchanged.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Wii / PS2 version of Sonic Unleashed.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Adventure series' Light Speed Shoes / Shadow the Hedgehog / Sonic '06.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from Sonic Adventure.

Replacing ''I'm with you'' with an edited version of ''Vandalize''.

I call it ''Vandalize [Re-Edit]'' :)
Replacing ''I'm with you'' with ''One Way Dream''.
Does not modify The End's theme.
Keeps ''Mystery Girl'' when encountering a Titan for the first time.
Replaces ''Mystery Girl'' with an instrumental version of each of the Titan's boss theme.
Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with those that he makes when he falls off the map.
Keeps Sonic's vanilla voice clips.

Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with voice clips from Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric that serve the same purpose.

Not the ideal choice but whatever, I included it for fun.

I have to admit, Roget sucks when it comes to recording voice clips for dying :/
Adds Roger's voice to the Titan Sequences.

Remains Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game during the Titan sequences.

However, it will keep the extra sound effects.
Adds Roger's voice to the Guardian Intros.

Remains Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game during the Guardian intros.

However, it will keep the extra sound effects.
Keeps the Cyber Space soundtracks unchanged.
Makes Cyber Space's boost filters to sound like in Sonic Generations.

Replaces the Base Game's
Cyber Space stages with their Another Story remixes.

Replaces the Base Game's
Cyber Space stages with their Another Story remixes
and makes Cyber Space's boost filters to sound like in Sonic Generations.
Keeps the vanilla instrumental intro.
Replaces the instrumental part in the intro with the first verse of I'm Here.
Keeps Ouranos Island's theme unchanged.
Replacing Ouranos Island - Remix with Second Wind - Sonic Mvt.
Replacing Ouranos Island - Remix with the base game's version.
Replacing Ouranos Island - Remix with Theme of Starfall Islands, like in the base game.

Keeps Another Story's
Cyber Space soundtracks unchanged.

Makes Another Story's
Cyber Space boost filters to sound like in Sonic Generations.

Replaces the Another Story's
Cyber Space stages with their base game versions.

Replaces Another Story's
Cyber Space stages with their base game versions, and makes Cyber Space's boost filters to sound like in Sonic Generations.
Adds The End's monologue from the base game to the Another Story battle.
Disables the monologue.
